INTJ.description: Architects are imaginative and strategic thinkers, with a plan for everything.

INTP.description: Logicians are innovative inventors with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge.

ENTJ.description: Commanders are bold, imaginative, and strong-willed, always finding a way - or making one.

ENTP.description: Debaters are curious and flexible thinkers who cannot resist an intellectual challenge.

INFJ.description: Advocates are quiet visionaries, often serving as inspiring and tireless idealists.

INFP.description: Mediators are poetic, kind, and altruistic people, always eager to help a good cause.

ENFJ.description: Protagonists are inspiring optimists, readily taking action to do what they feel is right.

ENFP.description: Campaigners are enthusiastic, creative, and sociable free spirits, who can always find a reason to smile.

ISTJ.description: Logisticians are practical and fact-minded individuals, whose reliability cannot be doubted.

ISFJ.description: Defenders are very dedicated and warm protectors, always ready to defend their loved ones.

ESTJ.description: Executives are excellent organizers, unsurpassed at managing things - or people.

ESFJ.description: Consuls are very caring, social, community-minded people who are always eager to help.

ISTP.description: Virtuosos are innovative and practical experimenters, masters of all kinds of tools.

ISFP.description: Adventurers are flexible and charming, always ready to explore and experience something new.

ESTP.description: Entrepreneurs are savvy, energetic, and very perceptive people who truly enjoy living on the edge.

ESFP.description: Entertainers are spontaneous, energetic, and enthusiastic people â€“ life is never boring around them.
